title: WSL escapes file names contaning a character that is invalid on Win32, but it is inefficient
body: For example, when I create a file "a:b" under /root

comments.body: I encountered something similar but it looks like you might be on a newer build that does some escaping at least. https://github.com/Microsoft/BashOnWindows/issues/191 I think this is the same problem that I encountered, so I'm upvoting this issue rather than creating a new one.
